allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Add Timetable Module

- Add TimetableController with CRUD operations
- Add Timetable and TimetablePeriod models
- Add migrations for timetable tables
- Add timetable views (index, create, edit, periods)
- Support for class-wise timetable management
- Period types: class, break, lunch

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Add Attendance Module

- Add AttendanceController for student attendance
- Add StaffAttendanceController for staff attendance
- Add Attendance and StaffAttendance models with summaries
- Add migrations for attendance tables
- Add views for marking attendance, reports, calendar
- Support for present, absent, late, half-day status

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Add Examination Module

- Add ExamController with schedule and marks management
- Add Exam, ExamMark, ExamType models
- Add migrations for exam tables
- Add ExamTypeSeeder for default exam types
- Add views for exam schedule, marks entry, results
- Support for multiple exam types and grading

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 3: Add Fee Management Module

- Add FeeTypeController, FeeGroupController for fee setup
- Add FeeStructureController for class-wise fee structure
- Add FeeCollectionController for fee collection
- Add FeeType, FeeGroup, FeeStructure, FeeCollection models
- Add FeeDiscount model for discounts
- Add migrations and seeder for fee tables
- Add views for fee types, groups, structure, collection
- Add fee receipt with print functionality

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 4: Add Notices and Events Module

- Add NoticeController with CRUD and publishing
- Add EventController with CRUD and calendar view
- Add Notice, Event, EventPhoto models
- Add migrations for notices and events tables
- Add views for notices and events management
- Support for attachments, target audience, scheduling

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
